message.name: Skill Check
message.formula: &{template:default} {{name=?{Choose a Skill Check}}} {{roll=[[#face_value + ?{Choose a Skill Check| Acrobatics,(@{selected|acrobatics_bonus}) [ACROBATICS](#" style="color:Black;font-style:bold)| Animal Handling,(@{selected|animal_handling_bonus}) [ANIMAL HANDLING](#" style="color:Black;font-style:bold)| Arcana,(@{selected|arcana_bonus}) [ARCANA](#" style="color:Black;font-style:bold)| Athletics,(@{selected|athletics_bonus}) [ATHLETICS](#" style="color:Black;font-style:bold)| Deception,(@{selected|deception_bonus}) [DECEPTION](#" style="color:Black;font-style:bold)| History,(@{selected|history_bonus}) [HISTORY](#" style="color:Black;font-style:bold)| Insight,(@{selected|insight_bonus}) [INSIGHT](#" style="color:Black;font-style:bold)| Intimidation,(@{selected|intimidation_bonus}) [INTIMIDATION](#" style="color:Black;font-style:bold)| Investigation,(@{selected|investigation_bonus}) [INVESTIGATION](#" style="color:Black;font-style:bold)| Medicine,(@{selected|medicine_bonus}) [MEDICINE](#" style="color:Black;font-style:bold)| Nature,(@{selected|nature_bonus}) [NATURE](#" style="color:Black;font-style:bold)| Perception,(@{selected|perception_bonus}) [PERCEPTION](#" style="color:Black;font-style:bold)| Performance,(@{selected|performance_bonus}) [PERFORMANCE](#" style="color:Black;font-style:bold)| Persuasion,(@{selected|persuasion_bonus}) [PERSUASION](#" style="color:Black;font-style:bold)| Religion,(@{selected|religion_bonus}) [RELIGION](#" style="color:Black;font-style:bold)| Sleight of Hand,(@{selected|sleight_of_hand_bonus}) [SLEIGHT OF HAND](#" style="color:Black;font-style:bold)| Stealth,(@{selected|stealth_bonus}) [STEALTH](#" style="color:Black;font-style:bold)| Survival,(@{selected|survival_bonus}) [SURVIVAL](#" style="color:Black;font-style:bold)}]]}}

credit: Roll Template from @ahpook on Discord, fixed by Mike
